data.name: MindVenture
data.detailed_description:
Dive into adventure, explore the world and discover its secrets. You are part of a group of explorers that travels the world and help others seeking for answers.

Evolve your base camp

Upgrade your base with what you bring from your missions : build new buildings, plant trees and cook in order to be better prepared for your next adventures. Unlock new team members, make them progress, gaining experience with your team will grant you access to riskier missions !


Unleash your creativity

Discover this powerful level creator and express yourself then share your creations with your friends. Terraform your maps, place trees, props, characters and write their dialogs, quests. You have the power to create any story that you can imagine!
⠀

A mysterious world

Discover a peaceful world after the chaos, a huge catastrophe has fragmented the world into islands. Now, people leaves in peace but still need your assistance, help them, explore enigmatic temples and perhaps uncover long-forgotten secrets! You have a lot to learn to understand what happened before you.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Join a group of explorers and go on an adventure! Play, discover and create your own adventures to share with your friends.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 ou ultérieur (64 bits)
  • Processor: 2,8 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 ou ultérieur (64 bits)
  • Processor: 3,2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970, Radeon RX 570 or equivalent with 4GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
